description: This month, Paizo has introduced a variety of new releases for its Pathfinder and Starfinder series, captivating players with fresh adventures and expanded gameplay options. The excitement continues with the much-anticipated PaizoCon 2024, which promises to be a vibrant celebration of the community’s passion for role-playing games. For Pathfinder enthusiasts, the Howl of the Wild...
title: Paizo Shares New Adventures and Gears Up for PaizoCon 2024

description: Portal Games recently announced a closure sale for “Batman: Everybody Lies,” as their licensing agreement with Warner Bros is set to conclude at the end of May 2024. This game, a key offering in the Detective series, integrates detective-themed gameplay with the storied environment of Gotham City, and unfolds across a three-part epic campaign including...
title: Portal Games Announces Closure Sale for “Batman: Everybody Lies” Due to Licensing Expiry

description: Modiphius Entertainment is introducing a new project, “Cohors Cthulhu: Tactics,” slated for a Kickstarter launch at the end of May 2024. This game combines elements of horror-themed adventure with wargaming, set against a backdrop of ancient Rome where players battle avatars of the Outer Gods. The game is designed for solo and cooperative play, incorporating...
title: Experience Ancient Mythological Warfare with “Cohors Cthulhu: Tactics” – Coming to Kickstarter

description: Cubicle 7 Entertainment has made an announcement for their lineup of upcoming tabletop game releases, which includes updates on fan favorites like Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay and Warhammer 40,000: Wrath & Glory. In a recent video message, CEO Dom McDowall shared details about the products scheduled to hit shelves and those set for pre-order in the...
title: Cubicle 7 Announces Lineup of Upcoming Releases for 2024

description: Kickstarter has introduced new initiatives to extend its support to creators beyond the initial funding phase. In a recent video release titled “A New Vision for Kickstarter,” CEO Evert Taylor, alongside other team members, outlined a series of enhancements designed to help creators succeed after their campaigns conclude. Having facilitated the funding of various creative...
title: Kickstarter Announces Expanded Support for Creators Beyond Initial Funding

description: Arcane Wonders has announced the upcoming release of a new card game, Super Kawaii Pets. This game introduces players to a whimsical world where they adopt and care for pets, aiming to turn their sad expressions into joyful ones through strategic card play. In Super Kawaii Pets, players begin with Animal cards that are sad...
title: “Super Kawaii Pets” Set to Launch by Arcane Wonders

description: The TESA Collective has launched a Kickstarter campaign to fund the second edition of the cooperative board game “Good Dog, Bad Zombie.” This game, which features dogs as the protagonists in a zombie-infested city, was first released in 2018 and quickly gained popularity. Due to high demand, this new edition includes upgraded components, fresh artwork,...
title: “Good Dog, Bad Zombie” Second Edition Launches on Kickstarter

description: Warlord Games, in partnership with Osprey Games, has revealed plans to release “Armies of Germany,” a new supplement for Bolt Action: Third Edition. Scheduled for release in the first quarter of 2025, this book will be the first in a series of national supplements titled “Armies of…” The “Armies of Germany” supplement is designed to...
title: Warlord Games and Osprey Games Announce ‘Armies of Germany’ for Bolt Action: Third Edition

description: EN Publishing is set to launch a Kickstarter campaign for “The Voidrunner’s Codex,” a new expansion for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition (D&D 5E) and Level Up: Advanced 5th Edition (A5E), introducing players to space exploration and combat. The boxed set includes three books: the core “Voidrunner’s Codex,” the “Star Captain’s Manual,” and the introductory...
title: “The Voidrunner’s Codex” Expands D&D 5E and A5E into Space
